This app allows you to use your phone to fully emulate a USB keyboard without requiring any software on the connected device, allowing it to even work in the BIOS/UEFI of the connected device!
The source code of the application is available here
How do I report bugs or submit feature requests?
You can create an issue here. Just make sure it hasn\'t already been reported.
How do I use the app?

Manual Input: Type into the textbox and click the "send" button when you\'re done, at which point the text will be typed into the connected device all at once.\n\nDirect Input: Type into the textbox and the keys will be relayed to the connected device in realtime.
The app isn\'t working properly, how do I fix it?
First, make sure your device satisfies all prerequisites listed here and read the above answer about how to use the app. If that doesn\'t work, I recommend submitting a bug report as explained above.
